name: Yareli
description: The waverider can unleash a flood of destruction on the battlefield. Yareli’s aqueous attacks deal high damage. Surf’s up. Enemies down.

abilities.name: Sea Snares
abilities.description:
Form five water globules that seek out enemies and expand on contact, simultaneously damaging and immobilizing their victims.
Enemies hit by the globules take increased damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Merulina
abilities.description: Summon Merulina, a rideable creature of the waves, and the inspiration for K-Driving. Merulina protects Yareli by absorbing a large portion of incoming damage.

abilities.name: Aquablades
abilities.description: Tear through foes with a trio of orbiting aquatic blades.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Drag enemies into a crushing maelstrom and then blow them away in a watery burst. Each enemy trapped in the vortex increases the burst's damage.

languages.description: Die Wellenreiterin kann eine Flut der Zerstörung auf dem Schlachtfeld freisetzen. Yarelis Wasserangriffe verursachen hohen Schaden. Hohe Brandung. Tote Feinde.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: La waverider peut déclencher un déluge de destruction sur le champ de bataille. Les attaques aquatiques de Yareli infligent des Dégâts importants. Surfez et décimez.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: La waverider può scatenare un'ondata di distruzione sul campo di battaglia. Gli attacchi acquatici di Yareli infliggono danni elevati. Surfa sull'onda della distruzione.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: 이 파도의 기수는 전장에 파괴의 홍수를 터뜨릴 수 있습니다. 물을 기반으로 한 야렐리의 공격은 높은 피해를 가합니다. 서핑이 준비되면, 적들은 가라앉아야지요.
languages.name: 야렐리

languages.description: La surfista puede desatar un torrente de destrucción en el campo de batalla. Los ataques acuáticos de Yareli infligen mucho daño. Ella surfea. El enemigo cae.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: 驭浪者可以在战场上释放出毁灭的洪流。Yareli 的水系攻击可对敌人造成高额伤害。驭浪而上，敌军溺亡。
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: Укротительница волн Ярели может вызвать потоп и уничтожить всё на поле боя. Водные атаки наносят большой урон. Верхом на волне топите врагов.
languages.name: Ярели

languages.description: ウェーブライダーはその波で戦場に破壊をもたらす。Yareliの水属性の攻撃は彼女に命を与え、敵を溺死させる。
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: Surferka może rozpętać powódź zniszczenia na polu bitwy. Wodne ataki Yareli zadają wysokie obrażenia. Surfujemy. Wykończ wrogów.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: A surfista pode desencadear uma inundação de destruição no campo de batalha. Os ataques aquáticos da Yareli causam alto dano. Surfe e afogue os inimigos.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: 乘浪者在戰場上釋放毀滅的洪流。 Yareli 的水系攻擊造成高傷害。浪起敵亡。
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: นักโต้คลื่นเวฟไรเดอร์สามารถปล่อยภัยพิบัติทางน้ำเข้าทำลายล้างสนามรบ การโจมตีด้วยน้ำของ Yareli สร้างความเสียหายได้สูง ไต่คลื่นยักษ์ ซัดศัตรูให้ร่วงลง
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: Dalgaların sörfçüsü, savaş alanında bir yıkım dalgası yaratabilir. Yareli'nin su saldırıları yüksek hasar verir. Sörf yaparak düşmanların icabına bakmanın vakti geldi.
languages.name: Yareli

languages.description: Підкорювачка хвиль. Ярелі може викликати потоп і знищити все на бойовищі. Водяні атаки завдають великої шкоди. Верхи на хвилях топіть ворогів.
languages.name: Ярелі
